    • Method Detail

      • onDisabled

        public void onDisabled(android.content.Context context,
              android.content.Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
        Called prior to the administrator being disabled, as a result of receiving DeviceAdminReceiver.ACTION_DEVICE_ADMIN_DISABLED. Upon return, you can no longer use the protected parts of the DevicePolicyManager API.
        Overrides:
        onDisabled in class android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
        Parameters:
        context - The running context as per DeviceAdminReceiver.onReceive(android.content.Context, android.content.Intent).
        intent - The received intent as per DeviceAdminReceiver.onReceive(android.content.Context, android.content.Intent).

      • onDisableRequested

        public java.lang.CharSequence onDisableRequested(android.content.Context context,
                                        android.content.Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
        Called when the user has asked to disable the administrator, as a result of receiving DeviceAdminReceiver.ACTION_DEVICE_ADMIN_DISABLE_REQUESTED, giving you a chance to present a warning message to them. The message is returned as the result; if null is returned (the default implementation), no message will be displayed.
        Overrides:
        onDisableRequested in class android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
        Parameters:
        context - The running context as per DeviceAdminReceiver.onReceive(android.content.Context, android.content.Intent).
        intent - The received intent as per DeviceAdminReceiver.onReceive(android.content.Context, android.content.Intent).
        Returns:
        Return the warning message to display to the user before being disabled; if null is returned, no message is displayed.

      • onEnabled

        public void onEnabled(android.content.Context context,
             android.content.Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
        Called after the administrator is first enabled, as a result of receiving DeviceAdminReceiver.ACTION_DEVICE_ADMIN_ENABLED. At this point you can use DevicePolicyManager to set your desired policies.

        If the admin is activated by a device owner, then the intent may contain private extras that are relevant to user setup. DevicePolicyManager#createAndInitializeUser(ComponentName, String, String, ComponentName, Intent)

        Overrides:
        onEnabled in class android.app.admin.DeviceAdminReceiver
        Parameters:
        context - The running context as per DeviceAdminReceiver.onReceive(android.content.Context, android.content.Intent).
        intent - The received intent as per DeviceAdminReceiver.onReceive(android.content.Context, android.content.Intent).
